column5: We call his “squidge”.... he has the most “squidgy-ness” in all the land 🥰🥰🥰

Don’t lock yourself away, it’s not always a bad diagnosis. BPD means you feel emotions strongly. This makes you love things with all your heart, it makes you sensitive to other people’s emotions, it makes you brave (because you’re battling every day). It makes you emotionally intelligent compared to others because you’re super aware. It’s horrid for someone to basically say “there’s something wrong with your personality”... but remember, it’s not always bad. I feel you!!!! You’ve got this 💪🏼
You’ve just spoke my mind 100000%! We got this, though
